name: Water Dragon
text: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except with "Bonding - H2O". The ATK of FIRE monsters and Pyro-Type monsters becomes 0. When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon 2 "Hydrogeddons" and 1 "Oxygeddon" from your Graveyard.
